response.overview: The voices of Jamal's North African friends, imprisoned in detention centers, come from the mountains around the metropolis of Athens. He, confined to a small room on the eighth floor of a half-abandoned building, searches for the words that would resolve the labyrinth of life and existence.
response.tagline: Jamal, confined to a small room on the eighth floor of a half-abandoned building, searches for the words that will solve the labyrinth of life, exile and existence.
response.title: Je suis dehors
